text.author: Ar2332, Ibaman, SPILMAN and others (see URL)
text.title: Athens
text.summary: This article presents Athens, an ancient city and capital of modern Greece with a metropolitan population of 3.7 million, which hosted the 2004 Olympic games and features archeological sites and restored neoclassical as well as post-modern buildings, and is best visited in spring and late autumn.
